properties.Name: Bois de Moncor
properties.description:
Type: Artificial Mound County/Region: Freiburg Alt Name: Moncor Fürstengrabhügel
Pos Accuracy: 5 Condition: 4 (5 is best) Ambience: 3 Access: 4 (5 is best)
Lat: 46.79699    Long: 7.1149
Artificial Mound in Freiburg. Tumulus built during Late Hallstatt period. Examined in 1983 by archaeologist, found in 1962 and forgotten for a good while. Diameter 80 metres, 10 metres high..
